Class KeepExceptionWrongServer

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeepExceptionType, java.io.Serializable

    public class KeepExceptionWrongServer
extends KeepException
implements KeepExceptionType

    Requested a database that is not on the current server mostly used in PIM context. Special here: Message = Redirection URL!
